data.name: Confirm.User.Delete
data.value: Na u kholisehile hore u batla ho hlakola {0}?

data.name: AllowRegistration.HelpText
data.value: Na u batla hore baeti ba sa tsejoeng ba ka ingolisa bakeng sa ak'haonte sebakeng sa marang-rang?

data.name: RegisterUrl.HelpText
data.value: Ka boikhethelo, fana ka URL ea ngoliso ea tloaelo

data.name: ProfileUrl.HelpText
data.value: Ka boikhethelo, fana ka URL ea profil ea mosebelisi ea tloaelo

data.name: LockoutDuration.HelpText
data.value: Palo ea metsotso eo mosebelisi a lokelang ho koaloa ka eona

data.name: MaximumFailures.HelpText
data.value: Palo e phahameng ka ho fetisisa ea liteko tsa ho saena pele mosebelisi a koaloa

data.name: RequireDigit.HelpText
data.value: Bontša hore na li-password li tlameha ho ba le linomoro

data.name: RequireLower.HelpText
data.value: Bontša hore na li-password li tlameha ho ba le litlhaku tse nyane

data.name: RequirePunctuation.HelpText
data.value: Bontša hore na li-password li tlameha ho ba le litlhaku tse seng tsa alphanumeric (ke hore, matšoao)

data.name: RequireUpper.HelpText
data.value: Bontša hore na li-password li tlameha ho ba le litlhaku tse kholo

data.name: RequireUpper.Text
data.value: Na u hloka litlhaku tse kholo?

data.name: Success.UpdateConfig.Restart
data.value: Tlhophiso e ntlafalitsoe. Ka kopo khetha Qala bocha kopo bakeng sa liphetoho tsena hore li sebelisoe.

data.name: UniqueCharacters.HelpText
data.value: Palo e tlase ea litlhaku tse ikhethileng tseo phasewete e lokelang ho ba le tsona

data.name: AllowSiteLogin.HelpText
data.value: Na u batla ho lumella basebelisi ho kena ba sebelisa lebitso la mosebelisi le phasewete e laoloang sebakeng sa heno sebakeng sena sa marang-rang? Hlokomela hore o lokela ho tima khetho ena feela haeba o se o hlophisitse ka katleho mofani oa kantle oa ho kena, ho seng joalo o ka inotlela sebakeng sa marang-rang.

data.name: Authority.HelpText
data.value: URL ea bolaoli kapa URL ea mofani oa boitsebahatso e amanang le mofani oa boitsebahatso

data.name: AuthorizationUrl.HelpText
data.value: Qetello ea ho fumana khoutu ea tumello

data.name: ClientID.HelpText
data.value: ID ea moreki bakeng sa mofani oa boitsebahatso

data.name: ClientSecret.HelpText
data.value: Lekunutu la moreki bakeng sa mofani oa boitsebahatso

data.name: CreateUsers.HelpText
data.value: Na u batla hore basebelisi ba bacha ba bōptjoe ka boiketsetso? Haeba u tima khetho ena, basebelisi ba tlameha ho se ba ngolisitsoe sebakeng sa marang-rang ho kena ka ho kena ka ntle.

data.name: DomainFilter.HelpText
data.value: Provide any email domain filter criteria (separated by commas). Domains to exclude should be prefixed with an exclamation point (!). For example 'microsoft.com,!hotmail.com' would include microsoft.com email addresses but not hotmail.com email addresses.

data.name: EmailClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally specify the type name of the email address claim provided by the identity provider. The typical value is 'email'.

data.name: ExternalLoginSettings.Heading
data.value: Litlhophiso tsa ho kena ka ntle

data.name: MetadataUrl.HelpText
data.value: Sebaka sa ho sibolla bakeng sa ho fumana metadata bakeng sa mofani enoa oa boitsebahatso. Bolela feela haeba mofani oa boitsebahatso a sa sebelise mokhoa o tloaelehileng (ke hore, /.well-known / openid-configuration)

data.name: PKCE.HelpText
data.value: Bontša hore na mofani oa boitsebahatso o ts'ehetsa senotlolo sa bopaki bakeng sa phapanyetsano ea khoutu (PKCE)

data.name: ProviderName.HelpText
data.value: Hlalosa lebitso la botsoalle bakeng sa mofani oa kantle oa ho kena o tla bonts'oa leqepheng la ho kena

data.name: ProviderType.HelpText
data.value: Khetha mofuta oa mofani oa ho kena ka ntle

data.name: RedirectUrl.HelpText
data.value: URL ea redirect (kapa callback url) eo hangata e hlokang ho ngolisoa le mofani oa boitsebahatso

data.name: Scopes.HelpText
data.value: Lethathamo la li-scopes tseo u ka li kōpang ho mofani oa boitsebahatso (tse arohaneng ka li-commas). Haeba ho se na li-scopes tse hlalositsoeng, li-scopes tse tloaelehileng li tla sebelisoa ka boiketsetso.

data.name: TokenUrl.HelpText
data.value: Qetello ea ho fumana letšoao la auth

data.name: UserInfoUrl.HelpText
data.value: Mokhoa oa ho fumana tlhaiso-leseling ea mosebelisi. Ena e lokela ho ba sebaka sa ho qetela sa API kapa URL ea leqephe e nang le aterese ea lengolo-tsoibila la mosebelisi.

data.name: CookieName.HelpText
data.value: U ka khetha ho sebelisa lebitso la cookie la netefatso ea tloaelo bakeng sa sebaka se seng le se seng. Leha ho le joalo, ka kopo elelloa hore haeba u batla ho arolelana cookie ea netefatso lipakeng tsa libaka tse sebakeng se le seng, ba hloka ho sebelisa lebitso la cookie le lumellanang. Hape hlokomela hore ho fetola lebitso la cookie ea netefatso ho tla tlosa basebelisi bohle ba hajoale.

data.name: Issuer.HelpText
data.value: Fana ka mofani oa thepa ea ka boikhethelo

data.name: Lifetime.HelpText
data.value: Palo ea metsotso eo letšoao le lokelang ho ba le eona

data.name: Secret.HelpText
data.value: Haeba u batla ho fana ka phihlello ea API, ka kopo hlakisa lekunutu le tla sebelisoa ho pata li-tokens tsa hau. Lekunutu le lokela ho ba le litlhaku tse 16 kapa ho feta ho netefatsa polokeho e nepahetseng. Ka kopo elelloa hore haeba u fetola lekunutu lena, li-tokens tsohle tse teng li tla fetoha tse sa sebetseng 'me li tla hloka ho nchafatsoa.

data.name: Token.HelpText
data.value: Tobetsa konopo ea Create Token ho hlahisa letšoao la phihlello ea nako e telele (e sebetsang selemo se le seng). Etsa bonnete ba hore u boloka letšoao lena sebakeng se sireletsehileng kaha u ke ke ua khona ho e fumana nakong e tlang.

data.name: TwoFactor.HelpText
data.value: Na u batla hore basebelisi ba sebelise netefatso ea lintlha tse peli? Hlokomela hore o lokela ho sebelisa khetho ea Holofetse ho fihlela o netefalitse ka katleho hore Mosebetsi oa Tsebiso ho Mesebetsi e Hlophisitsoeng o lumelletsoe mme likhetho tsa hau tsa SMTP ho Litlhophiso tsa Sebaka li hlophisitsoe ho seng joalo u tla inotlela.

data.name: IdentifierClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Specify the type name of the unique user identifier claim provided by the identity provider. The default value is 'sub'.

data.name: Parameters.HelpText
data.value: Ka boikhethelo, totobatsa mekhahlelo efe kapa efe e meng e le lipara tsa mabitso / boleng ho romella mofani oa boitsebahatso (e arohaneng ke li-commas haeba ho na le tse ngata).

data.name: RoleClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide the type name of the roles claim provided by the identity provider (the standard default is 'roles'). If role names from the identity provider do not exactly match your site role names, please use the Role Claim Mappings.

data.name: RoleClaimMappings.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide a comma delimited list of role names provided by the identity provider, as well as mappings to your site roles. For example if the identity provider includes an 'Admin' role name and you want it to map to the 'Administrators' site role you should specify 'Admin:Administrators'.

data.name: SynchronizeRoles.HelpText
data.value: Khetho ena e tla eketsa kapa e tlose likabelo tsa karolo e le hore mesebetsi ea sebaka sa marang-rang e lumellane hantle le mesebetsi e fanoeng ke mofani oa boitsebahatso bakeng sa mosebelisi

data.name: ProfileClaimTypes.HelpText
data.value: Optionally provide a comma delimited list of user profile claim type names provided by the identity provider, as well as mappings to your user profile definition. For example if the identity provider includes a 'given_name' claim and you have a 'FirstName' user profile definition you should specify 'given_name:FirstName'.

data.name: AuthFlow.CodeIdTokenToken
data.value: Khoutu ea tumello + ID Token + Access Token

data.name: AuthResponseType.HelpText
data.value: Hlalosa mofuta oa karabelo ea tumello. Khoutu ea tumello ke Khoutu ea Tumello e nkoang e le khetho e sireletsehileng ka ho fetesisa e ipapisitse le litlhaloso tsa morao-rao tsa OAuth.

data.name: VerifyUsers.HelpText
data.value: Na u batla hore basebelisi ba teng ba etse mohato o mong oa netefatso ea lengolo-tsoibila ho hokahanya ho kena ha bona ka ntle? Haeba u tima khetho ena, basebelisi ba seng ba ntse ba le teng ba tla hokahanngoa ka boiketsetso.

data.name: AlwaysRemember.HelpText
data.value: Ho nolofalletsa khetho ena ho tla beha cookie e sa feleng hammoho le Nako ea ho felloa ke nako ea cookie, e tla kena ka boiketsetso ho basebelisi nakong e tlang ha ba etela sebaka sa marang-rang. Ka boiketsetso, sebaka sa marang-rang se tla sebelisa li-cookie tsa session.

data.name: CookieExpiration.HelpText
data.value: You can choose to use a custom authentication cookie expiration timespan for each site (e.g. '08:00:00' for 8 hours). The default is 14 days if not specified.

data.name: CookieExpiration.Text
data.value: Nako ea ho felloa ke nako ea cookie:

data.name: ReviewClaims.HelpText
data.value: Khetho ena e tla rekota lenane le felletseng la likopo tse khutlisitsoeng ke mofani ho Log ea Ketsahalo. E lokela ho sebelisoa feela bakeng sa merero ea liteko. Ho kena kantle ho naha ho tla thibeloa ha khetho ena e lumelloa.

data.name: NameClaimType.HelpText
data.value: Optionally specify the type name of the user's name claim provided by the identity provider. The typical value is 'name'.

data.name: Provider.HelpText
data.value: Khetha mofani oa ho kena ka ntle

data.name: SaveTokens.HelpText
data.value: Hlalosa hore na li-tokens tsa phihlello le tsa khathollo li lokela ho bolokoa kamora ho kena ka katleho. Phoso ke leshano ho fokotsa boholo ba cookie ea netefatso.

data.name: LogoutEverywhere.HelpText
data.value: Na u batla hore basebelisi ba tlohe sebokeng se seng le se seng se sebetsang ho sesebelisoa sefe kapa sefe, kapa feela seboka sa bona sa hajoale?

data.name: AllowHostRole.HelpText
data.value: Bontša hore na mesebetsi ea moamoheli e tšehetsoa ke mofani oa boitsebahatso. Ka kopo sebelisa tlhokomelo ka khetho ena kaha e lumella mosebelisi oa moamoheli ho tsamaisa sebaka se seng le se seng sa marang-rang ka har'a ho kenya ha hau.
